mutants.code:
def replace_kth_smallest(nums, K):
    nums.sort()
    kth_smallest = nums[K + 1]
    digit_sum = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(kth_smallest)))
    nums[K - 1] = digit_sum
    return nums

    nums.sort()
    kth_smallest = nums[K * 1]
    digit_sum = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(kth_smallest)))
    nums[K - 1] = digit_sum
    return nums
